Articles.Content:
Yes you heard it right it isn't dead as we all hoped on bop but it is somehow affecting pol. When you try and land on pol you explode before reaching the surfice . What other moons and/or planets will be infected next?

#savethemoons
The Secret Society For The Prevention of Kraken Attacks (SSFTPKA) will have to deploy it's finest units to deal with this danger!
I've landed on Pol.... and it is truly terrifying... it's all hills and slopes and pointy, sharp rocks.

Getting into orbit on Pol is easy... But I have a few explosions when trying to land on it... Quite weird, but the same happens to Bop, at least not that much, the gravity even saved one of my parts full of fuel.

I've landed on Pol.... and it is truly terrifying... it's all hills and slopes and pointy, sharp rocks.

http://i.imgur.com/zpK404P.png

That's kraken dung - you're close to it's nest! RUUUUUUUUN!

That's kraken dung - you're close to it's nest! RUUUUUUUUN!

It found them!!! And it was a truly terrifying ordeal!!

But in a desperate move, Val poked the Kraken in the eye with a flagpole, and thus slew the mighty beast!!!!

It's a conspiracy by the kerbinati. please wear your tin hat and RUN!

And there is a bug on pol so you cant timewarp or quicksave there

It found them!!! And it was a truly terrifying ordeal!!

But in a desperate move, Val poked the Kraken in the eye with a flagpole, and thus slew the mighty beast!!!!

http://i.imgur.com/OHlIsV0.png

http://i.imgur.com/FWNbZsa.png

Wait what? I thought the Kraken was located in Moho... MY LIFE WAS A LIE THIS WHOLE TIME!!

Wait what? I thought the Kraken was located in Moho... MY LIFE WAS A LIE THIS WHOLE TIME!!

Actually it's on Bop... ;-)
Now that I think about it, that might explaing the Report while I was flying around the poles... I seriously thought it was the Magic Bolder.

Now that I think about it, that might explaing the Report while I was flying around the poles... I seriously thought it was the Magic Bolder.

http://imageshack.com/a/img661/4688/hjjEpL.jpg

It can be seen from pretty high up as a sparkly dot.... much higher than boulders normally show up. That's how I found it. When I did a second orbit it didn't go away I knew I had something...
Yay... I finally found it, and claimed as my property, with a flag on it... <3

Now that I think about it, that might explaing the Report while I was flying around the poles... I seriously thought it was the Magic Bolder.

http://imageshack.com/a/img661/4688/hjjEpL.jpg

Space near Bop?

It has no biomes???

Space near Bop?

It has no biomes???

Crew reports from space near aren't biome specific. EVA reports are, for some reason.

As to overheat, I've had this happen near Minmus of all places - a structural fuselage that held the docking port collection on a new station just up and poofed at a 35km periapsis (capture, not landing as it's an orbital station). It might have involved struts, as in a subsequent attempt after disconnecting and reconnecting went fine, without overheat.
